title: Spitting Brooms (The Uptown Remix): Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
itunes:title: Spitting Brooms (The Uptown Remix): Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
description:
Langston and David break down an old wives tale sent in by a listener about needing to spit on a broom if it accidentally sweeps across your feet.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
